instrument.description: Instrument that was used to perform the measurement
instrument.title: instrument

derivedProperties.description: Results obtained from analysing the data
derivedProperties.title: derivedProperties

remarks.description: String with markup in HTML syntax.
remarks.title: remarks

dataSource.description: Description of the source of the data
dataSource.title: dataSource

value.description: The value of the quantitative value or property value node.
value.title: value

minValue.description: The lower value of some uncertainty distribution of a characteristic or property.
minValue.title: minValue

maxValue.description: The upper value of some uncertainty distribution of a characteristic or property.
maxValue.title: maxValue

standardDeviation.description: The standard of some uncertainty distribution of a characteristic or property.
standardDeviation.title: standardDeviation

unitText.description: A string or text indicating the unit of measurement. Useful if you cannot provide a standard unit code for unitCode.
unitText.title: unitText

unitCode.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters) or a URL. Other codes than the UN/CEFACT Common Code may be used with a prefix followed by a colon.
unitCode.title: unitCode

Instrument.description:
The instrument with which a spectrum was measured.
CHMO: 0000998
Instrument.title: Instrument

manufacturer.description: The name of the instrument manufacturer
manufacturer.title: manufacturer

serialNumber.description: The INTERNAL serial number of the instrument, e.g., the inventory number of the instrument in a university
serialNumber.title: serialNumber

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.
sku.title: sku

software.description: The name of the software and the version number
software.title: software

location.description: Describes the location of some object.
location.title: location

downloadUrl.description: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary
downloadUrl.title: downloadUrl

Location.description: Describes the location of some object.
Location.title: Location

building.description: Name or code of the building
building.title: building

room.description: Name or code of the room in which the object is localized
room.title: room

code.description: Internal code that is used to identify the location
code.title: code

BaseDerivedProperty.description: The purpose of this type is to allow to store some basic processing for provenance steps
BaseDerivedProperty.title: BaseDerivedProperty

instrument.description:
The instrument with which a spectrum was measured.
CHMO: 0000998
instrument.title: instrument

uuid.description: the UUID of the data in some other database, for example, the UUID of the node of the object in AiiDAlab
uuid.title: uuid

doi.description: Digital object identifier of the source object
doi.title: doi
